name: ParagonIU_Chatbot_v1
description: This flow integrates PDF reading with a language model to answer document-specific questions. Ideal for small-scale texts, it facilitates direct queries with immediate insights. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

author.last_name: Kim Songyean ធី គីម សុងយាន
author.full_name: Thy Kim Songyean ធី គីម សុងយាន

data.description: Create a prompt template with dynamic variables.

code.name: code
code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import TemplateField
from axiestudio.field_typing.prompt import Prompt


class PromptComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "Prompt"
    description: str = "Create a prompt template with dynamic variables."
    icon = "prompts"

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "template": TemplateField(display_name="Template"),
            "code": TemplateField(advanced=True),
        }

    async def build(
        self,
        template: Prompt,
        **kwargs,
    ) -> Prompt:
        prompt = await Prompt.from_template_and_variables(template, kwargs)
        self.status = prompt.format_text()
        return prompt

template.name: template

node.description: Create a prompt template with dynamic variables.

code.name: code

path.info: Supported file types: txt, md, mdx, csv, json, yaml, yml, xml, html, htm, pdf, docx
path.name: path

silent_errors.info: If true, errors will not raise an exception.
silent_errors.name: silent_errors

node.description: Get chat inputs from the Playground.

code.name: code
code.value:
from typing import Optional

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from typing import Union


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "ChatInput"

    def build_config(self):
        build_config = super().build_config()
        build_config["input_value"] = {
            "input_types": [],
            "display_name": "Text",
            "multiline": True,
        }
        build_config["return_message"] = {
            "display_name": "Return Record",
            "advanced": True,
        }

        return build_config

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "User",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "User",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        files: Optional[list[str]] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        return_message: Optional[bool] = True,
    ) -> Union[Message, Text]:
        return super().build_with_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            files=files,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_message=return_message,
        )

input_value.name: input_value
input_value.value: what is the motto of paragon?

session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.
session_id.name: session_id

node.description: Display a chat message in the Playground.

code.name: code
code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message


class ChatOutput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Output"
    description = "Display a chat message in the Playground."
    icon = "ChatOutput"

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "Machine",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "AI",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        files: Optional[list[str]] = None,
        return_message: Optional[bool] = False,
    ) -> Union[Message, Text]:
        return super().build_with_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            files=files,
            return_message=return_message,
        )

session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.
session_id.name: session_id

code.name: code

max_tokens.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited tokens.
max_tokens.name: max_tokens

openai_api_base.info:
The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.
openai_api_base.name: openai_api_base

openai_api_key.info: The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.
openai_api_key.name: openai_api_key

stream.info: Stream the response from the model. Streaming works only in Chat.
stream.name: stream

system_message.info: System message to pass to the model.
system_message.name: system_message

code.name: code

record_template.name: record_template
record_template.info: Template to convert Record to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Record's text key.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: Session ID of the chat history.

node.description: Retrieves stored chat messages given a specific Session ID.
